text: __NOTOC__ Year 473 BC was a year of the pre-Julian Roman calendar. == Events == === By place === ==== China ==== * The State of Wu is added by the State of Yue. ==== Japan ==== * The Hikawa Shrine is formed in Saitama, Saitama. == Deaths == * King Fuchai of Wu, the last king of Wu in Zhou Dynasty China Category:470s BC
title: 473 BC
